DOC.brief_summary: Improve health and outcome for people with late stage chronic kidney disease by providing patient centered nursing services in addition to a Nephrologist's routine patient care.
DOC.brief_title: Healthy Transitions in Late Stage Kidney Disease
DOC.criteria: Stage 45 Chronic Kidney Disease (CKD), defined as estimated glomerular filtration rate (eGFR) between 030 ml/minute 18 years of age or older Cognitive impairment that is clinically apparent
